title: Directory
description: A directory on the file system.
$comment:
Previously this type extended `Collection` (which in turn extends `CreativeWork`).
However, to avoid consuming more memory that necessary when creating directory listings
with many directories, it now extends `Entity`.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

path.description: The path (absolute or relative) of the file on the file system.

parts.description: The files and other directories within this directory.
